mirrors edge was one of the first games i played after i built my first pc back in 2009  imo its visual style and sound design are still immaculate  the combat was a little annoying at times such as the warehouse level where there were cops wearing body armor standing on a catwalk above you and there were a few tricky areas that required practice to nail the sequence of moves  but all in all i still think its an incredible game and quite an experience

mirrors edge brings back pure 2009 nostalgia with its clean minimalist art style and stunningly smooth parkour mechanics it still feels unique today the mix of fastpaced movement and small environmental puzzles keeps things fresh while the beautiful soundtrack perfectly matches the games sleek visuals and futuristic tone a short but unforgettable experience that holds up incredibly well
